tweets.text:
EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz

On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh

Well that‚Äôs good they have removed the bench but no attempt to repair the bund to prevent contaminated water entering the Gaywood River @EnvAgencyAnglia & if the pollution isn‚Äôt enough the river gets dredged  even where it‚Äôs 3m below the fields Why ?@GlavenEel Chalkstream hell https://t.co/wvjYoFh5Nd https://t.co/CKZIvnlLru

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Would you live here? Would you authorise a landfill near your home? 
#StopTheStink #WalleysQuarry https://t.co/x8TP9ws922

@maireadc_2010 @annjsmall @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe None of us should have this inflicted on us how dare they ruin our lives and health like this . In the words of my son's placard they took our air and that is not right xx https://t.co/tNwhgF6KXZ

It was like that from mid evening ,at least 9 hours of exposure & health symptoms for many people. In the top 5 worst night we‚Äôve ever had. Unforgivable @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Cap it, close it, clean it up or we‚Äôll be coming for you in court #stopthestink https://t.co/hwvsch5ZPH

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL What IS the progress? It absolutely stinks again. Now in all directions. 

So? Answers are needed. We have now had enough. Actions not PR. Actions not pictures. Whatever you are doing IS NOT working. You are destroying my ability to work. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink

@HelenVi00175623 @maireadc_2010 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe We know what they are suffering at hands of landfill profiteers, stand together, support each other, & we will get our clean air one day.

@guynewey @wpi_economics @SMFthinktank @floodre And for more depth see work we did with @B_I_Tweets and @EnvAgency https://t.co/XB3ZnC5oTL . This draws on evidence from behavioural science as well as work in other fields of climate / resilience / natural hazard adaptation.

@guynewey That builds on work @wpi_economics has done on household flood resilience. This shows huge barriers to consumer action which mean that even when you try to pay households to take action they don't. See here for work with @SMFthinktank @floodre https://t.co/HAyOlIlJUN
